RasterFunctionTemplate.Name: MetersToMillimeters

Function.Name: Meters to Millimeters Unit Conversion Function
Function.Description: Convert values from Meters to Millimeters.

RasterFunctionTemplate.Help: Raster Function Templates may be activated in ArcMap by loading the service into the map, right clicking on the service in the Table of Contents to select Properties, and selecting the desired function from the Processing Templates tab. For help with invoking raster functions via REST calls, see http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Raster_function_objects/02r3000000rv000000/.
